thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Who’s Who Among Trump’s Law-Enforcement Targets

author: Chris Gordon
title: Who’s Who Among Trump’s Law-Enforcement Targets
text:
President Donald Trump’s attacks on top Justice Department and FBI officials on Friday mark his latest escalation of rhetoric on officials who one way or another have a hand in investigating ties between the president’s associates and Russia.
The Twitter comments come as a House committee is expected to release a Republican-authored classified memo describing surveillance of a former Trump campaign aide who was long on the radar of U.S. intelligence officials. Investigators probing Trump campaign links to Russia and obstruction...
